name: HookBall Arena
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Summary

Welcome challengers for the annual competition of HookBall.

In this racing/battle game, you will compete in an arena with other players in order to be the one to claim the maximum of points.

To do this you will have to go through a bunch of rings, with each one giving a different amount of points regarding the difficulty it is to obtain them.

But beware because a lot of deadly traps in the arena will try to stop you in your journey to become the BEST HOOKBALL PLAYER.

As always have fun, and MAY THE BEST WIN !!!

Controls

The game is played from 2 two 4 player in split screen with gamepad controller

  • Right Trigger -> Shoot / Retract Grapplin
  • Left Trigger -> Brake
  • X / A -> Jump
  • Right Joystick -> Rotate Camera
  • Left Joystick -> Direct Ball Control
